b'My apologies to Jake Wood & Wendy Leonelli, who I just learned were with me in the elevator. They are not a couple (as a falsely assumed), but colleagues who were in Billings meeting with city leadership to work on their affordable housing crisis. Dunno about the other dude.'
b'RT @CBSMornings: TOMORROW: Legendary skateboarder @TonyHawk and director @SamJones share why it was important to show off Tony\xe2\x80\x99s triumphs -\xe2\x80\xa6'

b'While you\xe2\x80\x99re here, watch \xe2\x80\x9cUntil The Wheels Fall Off\xe2\x80\x9d on @HBO. I promise there aren\xe2\x80\x99t any tales of mistaken identity. This is like me telling you to listen to my SoundCloud, if SoundCloud were a documentary about my career that I didn\xe2\x80\x99t make.'
b'@Kevin_805_ Yes, by the first guy. But not the second'

b'(elevator stops, couple exits to their floor)
Other guy: \xe2\x80\x9cwhat\xe2\x80\x99s the joke?\xe2\x80\x9d
Me: I get mistaken identity a lot
Him: \xe2\x80\x9cmistaken for who?\xe2\x80\x9d
Me: Tony Hawk
Him: \xe2\x80\x9chaha you do look like him!\xe2\x80\x9d
Elevator stops again, he exits on his floor. I am left alone, heading upwards & feeling perplexed'

b'This just happened, and maybe this is where it all ends:
Got an elevator with 3 people.
One guy (with his wife), sarcastically: \xe2\x80\x9canyone ever tell you you\xe2\x80\xa6\xe2\x80\x9d and stops.
Me (amused): yes, but you\xe2\x80\x99re the first today.
His wife: \xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m sorry, I tried to stop him from doing the joke\xe2\x80\x9d'

b'Thanks to Sam Jones & Greg Finton for telling my story, and for showcasing skateboarding in a truly authentic way. I hope it inspires people to follow their dreams & make positive change, or at least give insight as to why we are obsessed with riding a wooden plank with 4 wheels.'
b'Here is an example of that mindset: this is the last trick I learned (created?) only a week before I broke my leg: Cab body varial to 5-0 to fakie. https://t.co/lOw1VNOs7C'

b'through this journey and neither compares to the feeling of riding away from a trick that you\xe2\x80\x99ve battled for hours, weeks or years. I continue to do it because I can still be creative in a way gives me a personal sense of pride and validation.'

b'both physically and emotionally, for being singularly focused on something. I hope that it gives some perspective on why we do this and why I haven\xe2\x80\x99t quit; it\xe2\x80\x99s never been for fame or fortune (as they were not rewarded to skaters when I started), but I\xe2\x80\x99ve had my share of both'

b'I\xe2\x80\x99ve said many times that I won\xe2\x80\x99t stop skating until I am physically unable. A broken leg - with plenty of hardware - will probably be the biggest test of that creed. I\xe2\x80\x99ll be back\xe2\x80\xa6 maybe not at full capacity but I resigned to that notion years ago as I approached \xe2\x80\x9cmid-life.\xe2\x80\x9d'

b'It is about my life & career, with a strong focus on the philosophy of how I/we do this at our age. The answer is nuanced, but it\xe2\x80\x99s mostly because I found my sense of purpose and shaped my identity through skating, and it keeps me sane.'

b'Yesterday sucked. me: Thanks!
She looks up at me. I pause awkwardly. She looks back down. \xe2\x80\x9cNext!\xe2\x80\x9d'
b'@jesterkap2 @LLSusa You can\xe2\x80\x99t. That\xe2\x80\x99s what makes it rare. \nI received it as a gift after @THPSfilm release.'

b'Want to win a custom skateboard and 1x1 collab session with me? Share your fav Subway order by shouting it proudly as you attempt ANY trick. Tag #MySubwaySub #sweepstakes and @Subway \n#SubwayPartner Visit https://t.co/RYSIl2Rsbf for full rules https://t.co/agJVA69VZu'

b"#FathersDay is in less than 2 weeks... \nMy gift advice - and one that I've happily received - is a @Flaviar_com membership that takes you on a world distillery tour. The best part: you can share it with your loved ones from the comfort of your own home (as seen here). Cheers! #ad https://t.co/eSUdNwECCX"

b'Straight from the stage at @TheBitcoinConf to the miniramp.  I should have made time to get used to the ramp before bailing a bunch of fs ollies in front of thousands of people... but that\xe2\x80\x99s show business baby. Here are a few successful trick attempts from our quick session. https://t.co/afIsXVMV2c'
b'RT @TGBMike: Looking forward to hearing from @tonyhawk about #Bitcoin with @Disruptepreneur . Make sure you support @skatepark (formerly th\xe2\x80\xa6'

b'@ATCC1188 @steveo Voila: https://t.co/yOpeOti3Qw'

b'New episode of @steveo\xe2\x80\x99s Wild Ride! Is live. We talked about Jackass 4, @hawkvswolf, our double wallride and a few other things before he had to take an important business call... respect the hustle?\nhttps://t.co/TfHUtaaiuU'
b'@freejay She said \xe2\x80\x9cno way! He was a punker\xe2\x80\x9d'
b'@kenikereilly She\xe2\x80\x99s tried. It helped a little at first.'
b'Other nurse: it\xe2\x80\x99s true, and she still skates. I blame you for when she got hurt and I was short staffed for a week. \nMe: my sincere apologies. Don\xe2\x80\x99t do a kickflip.'

b'In waiting room of my wife\xe2\x80\x99s neurologist (because migraines)
Nurse: you look familiar
Me: that\xe2\x80\x99s cool
Nurse: your voice is familiar too. Is it bad if I ask you to lower your mask?
Me: I guess not since you\xe2\x80\x99re the nurse
Nurse: you\xe2\x80\x99re Tony Hawk! I got into skating from playing THPS'

b'In 1984 I was invited to be on a Japanese TV show called \xe2\x80\x9cWonder Kids.\xe2\x80\x9d There were caveats to my appearance: they asked me to lie about my age because guests were supposed to be under 15, and to change trick names because the original names didn\xe2\x80\x99t translate. My smirk says it all. https://t.co/VmlW6oUKtD'

b'The @HawkvsWolf1 podcast has landed. Listen / watch to our first show featuring @lizziearmanto and her inspiring story of trauma, perseverance and recovery: https://t.co/yOpeOt0srW (also on @spotify)'

b"@RAYGUNshirts I am honored by the gesture, but unfortunately I won't be in Des Moines this weekend to make the purchase. But if you happen to see @Lizziearmanto or Felipe Nunes, please pass it on and I can get it from them next week."
b'My tribute to @paulwellerHQ thanks to @PRK_LA (I traded in my elephant costume for a suit + skateboard)\n\xf0\x9f\x8e\xa4\xf0\x9f\x95\xb4\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbc\xf0\x9f\x9b\xb9\nhttps://t.co/QCkTVZmePu'

b'In the city there\xe2\x80\x99s a thousand things I wanna sing to you. Thanks to @PRK_LA for the opportunity to perform my favorite Jam song with some punk legends. Coming tomorrow. \xf0\x9f\x8e\xa4\xf0\x9f\x95\xb4\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbc\xf0\x9f\x9b\xb9 https://t.co/CQ4sbWf9MX'

b"I became a @flaviar_com member two years ago and they've helped me take my new passion of trying new Whiskey to the next level. So I speak from experience when I say a membership can be a great Father's Day gift. Cheers to dads! #ad https://t.co/SJuj68dc0C"
b'To clairfiy: this is a limited edition print of the drawing. And yes, we signed them all'

b'This limited edition, signed/numbered BALL-POINT PEN (!) drawing by Paul Kobriger (based on the original photo by @jgrantbrittain) is now available. Proceeds benefit @skatepark, helping to build more public parks in underserved areas. These will go fast: https://t.co/FhHiUnaWnV'

b'One of the most ardent supporters of The @skatepark Project in the last year has been the prolific @steveo. He helped raise over $500k for public skateparks through social media & thousands of signed prints. As a small gift of gratitude, we made him a custom surfboard. Yeah dude! https://t.co/bXTKckk7EH'

b'#advertisement When @mercedesBenz lent me their new e-longboard, I was excited. After they revealed their fully-electric #ConceptEQT by @mercedeseq, I was even more impressed. Stylish & durable - how e-mobility should look & feel. It could make anyone want to switch to electric. https://t.co/i5nfHObc7y'

b'Thank you for all of the bday wishes! \nHere is a pic from my first time on a skateboard at age 9. Never imagined I\xe2\x80\x99d get to do it for a living, or that I\xe2\x80\x99d be able to do it all 44 years later. \nI appreciate all of the support throughout this wildest of rides. https://t.co/9JkcqHPrKI'
b'Same trick, different axis: https://t.co/rJQsKvLthD'
b'How cool is that? Check-out my collab clip with @mercedesbenz, who have just revealed their #ConceptEQT. #ad https://t.co/J60MjaYK80'
b'@SkaOrNah Does having Specials, Madness, Selecter and Operation Ivy on vinyl in the 80\xe2\x80\x99s answer your question?'

b'She recently sat with @EllisMate and me for our new podcast @hawkvswolf1 to finally tell her story. It is a gripping account of trauma, uncertainty, resilience, strength and inspiration. She is the gnarliest, and we are lucky to have her. Show drops May 24 on your nearest device.'

b'On 10/26/20 @Lizziearmanto took one of the heaviest slams in skateboarding history. She basically flew 30 feet across a jump straight into a wall and then nearly 20 feet to the ground. She has been recovering quietly ever since, and just recently started skating again. https://t.co/KpLDgCgOfN'
b'Well deserved @MaxParrot! You are a true inspiration to all of us. https://t.co/jCkAFXlaHH'

b'@Vach0n You\xe2\x80\x99ve got it all wrong. I created the Madonna trick in 1985, and it\xe2\x80\x99s done in the frontside direction. Not long after, I did it the backside direction but it had no name. She was married to Sean Penn at the time, so I named it after him. I am a huge fan of both of them FWIW'

b'New trick: The \xe2\x80\x9cSpicoli Slide\xe2\x80\x9d
aka Sean Penn to tailslide
(a \xe2\x80\x9cSean Penn\xe2\x80\x9d is a backside Madonna)
Thank you for coming to my Trick Talk. https://t.co/dTdePlipVQ'
b'Still working on building this in-home skatepark... just waiting on permits. https://t.co/Dcf27xCGij'
b'@Rhenaiya You have officially earned the right to wear a Thrasher shirt without ridicule'

b'Here\xe2\x80\x99s a fun yet frightening trick I was challenged with recently. The risk to reward ratio is severely lopsided on this one; my great reward was not hanging up and falling to the flat bottom. \xf0\x9f\x9b\xb9\xf0\x9f\x8e\x89 https://t.co/8Ld8XvU799'
b'@SPE_Token_BSC I took the @BookCameo money from this and bought $SPE. True story'
b'@RexChapman That smile is exactly why I still skate'
b'That time @WayneBrady killed me softly with his song on @cwwhoseline. This kickflip might be my legacy. https://t.co/M7BHOGOQjI'
b'Happy birthday Kevin Staab! \nWe\xe2\x80\x99ve been skating together for over 40 years and he can still do backside ollies over my head... literally. https://t.co/CznDZRTSor'

b'I recently joined the @GoDaddy team to help create a series called #GoForth. Follow along as three entrepreneurial athletes tell their stories and show us what real grit and determination look like. Watch the full Go Forth series now. https://t.co/D806IQAr24 \n#GoDaddyPartner'

b'Aloha vibes with the family in the most recent \xe2\x80\x9cMASHER\xe2\x80\x9d video on @thrashermag featuring most of our kids. Tax day fun fact: taking a family vacation that ends up as a Thrasher edit makes it a write-off expense... at least that\xe2\x80\x99s what I\xe2\x80\x99ll tell the auditor.\nhttps://t.co/0MIpWqta70'
b'@Bosslogic @NaomiCampbell Virtual fist-bump?'

b"My current skateboard (the one I\xe2\x80\x99ve been riding) is now available for auction, with proceeds going to @ERACoalition, honoring champions of women's rights and the ERA. Also available: a signed @Lizziearmanto deck (used by her) - BID NOW:\xc2\xa0\nhttps://t.co/gHKkjRfaGC"

b'1988 \xe2\x80\x9cpublicity photos\xe2\x80\x9d for Vision Skate Escape taken in Venice by @cuffarophoto. Layback lipslide?!? I was such a poser. Thanks to Chris Cuffaro for unlocking your vault and sending these along. The 80\xe2\x80\x99s were magically absurd. Regrettably, I never tailslid the Venice ledge irl. https://t.co/2kgozDx7xs'

b'This is pretty cool: @XGames synchronized our doubles runs from 1999 and 2021. The main difference: my level of exhaustion in the later clip (but maybe not @andymacdonald\xe2\x80\x99s).\nOther than than, subtle refinements.\n\xf0\x9f\x8e\xa4: @selema (of course) https://t.co/kPMFLVKGmT'
b'@danigeos December 2012 issue of Thrasher'

b'@danigeos This is wild. The picture ended up in @thrashermag a month later (maybe you guys are in the background?), and the photographer suffered a heart attack last week so we\xe2\x80\x99ve been trying to help his family: https://t.co/F3SITjvJHl https://t.co/HYQhgPF16v'

b'After posting our 1999 doubles run last week, the feedback was incredible. I received thousands of comments about the love for that era of skating. The nostalgia was so strong that @andymacdonald & I decided to do it again, 22 years later - complete with @selema on the mic. Enjoy https://t.co/DRHWgWsA1e'

b'I\xe2\x80\x99m proud to be part of a new @GoDaddy original series called #GoForth. Following three entrepreneurs, we explore what it takes to be an elite athlete running your own business. Explore the series now: https://t.co/D806IQAr24 #GoDaddyPartner https://t.co/fEIWXDcwQb'
b'Devo belongs in the @rockhall. You can help get them there. #DEVOTE!\nhttps://t.co/luZCGqlZS8 https://t.co/H8fDDOIdqb'

b'Somehow I got the raw feed of our final doubles run at 1999 @XGames. It\xe2\x80\x99s awkward to see without commentary from @selema so I asked @andymacdonald to give his version of what he was thinking, and I did the same (based on what I could remember). Here are our takes back to back: https://t.co/XB9yArbfKz'

b'Jumping between buildings in downtown LA for MTV\xe2\x80\x99s Senseless Acts Of Video (2000). The gap was 16\xe2\x80\x99 which was big at the time since \xe2\x80\x9cMegaramps\xe2\x80\x9d were not a thing yet. I was more concerned about the rain than the distance though.\nFun fact: we also scouted Cecil Hotel for this stunt. https://t.co/SUMmgkAMjl'
b'Did this trick once 10 years ago and just did it again today for the second time. No finality to it, more like visiting an old friend... or a scary acquaintance. https://t.co/sCFmAs4S2Q'
b'@mitc43ll 900!'

Save 15% using code \xe2\x80\x9cTony\xe2\x80\x9d and 5% of profits go to @skatepark #ad https://t.co/la2AJnrKmq'

b'A winning \xe2\x80\x9cstreet\xe2\x80\x9d run from 1991 M\xc3\xbcnster Monster Mastership (in Germany). My takeaway 30 years later: pumping down bank/wedge ramps is laborious and ineffective. Manual to blunt was kinda cool though. https://t.co/hYfU1EnEYw'

b'Not sure why this interaction resurfaced, but while you\xe2\x80\x99re here... please help us build more public skateparks by purchasing this signed 8x12: a pic of me from 1987. Half of proceeds go to The @skatepark Project. And yes, I personally signed them all: https://t.co/uuxo8CzUrV https://t.co/kQHMI1f38K'
b'The concert was great though. Maynard covered Bohemian Rhapsody!'

b'I wish. What did happened: they hid my vert ramp by hanging it in the ceiling of Staples. When the time came for our surprise skate demo, the winch motors got stuck and the ramp never descended. We ended up skating across the floor & ollie-ing up the stage. So yeah, one trick! https://t.co/eoJpVS8rm2'
b'Way past my bedtime (I\xe2\x80\x99m old) but I\xe2\x80\x99ll make an exception... https://t.co/ROOz4g9CMW'
b'@CaucasianJames [still] standing by'
b'Shakedown, 1979 https://t.co/S4OeWWFnYx'
b'@DippinShits @skatepark Close enough'

b'While we\xe2\x80\x99re on the subject: I\xe2\x80\x99m offering these signed 8x12\xe2\x80\x99s and half of proceeds go to The @Skatepark Project, helping to build more parks in underserved areas (inevitably more places for me to have these awkward interactions). The pic is from 1987, btw\nhttps://t.co/QDtISyodtm https://t.co/wFRV0rBAD9'

b'Went to a local skatepark that got support from The @Skatepark Project on our last day of vacation. A kid recognized me as I got there
Him: \xe2\x80\x9cHey, how old are you?\xe2\x80\x9d
Me: 52
Him: \xe2\x80\x9cbut weren\xe2\x80\x99t you 48?!\xe2\x80\x9d
Me: yes, I was once 48
Him: \xe2\x80\x9cnever mind\xe2\x80\x9d (shakes head)
Me: time passes, I\xe2\x80\x99m sorry'
b'@quietmoderation So true'
b'Unrelated (kinda): I saw legendary skater Chris Senn in the water... we both recognized each other https://t.co/chJGjq9mUg'

b'Surfing in Hawaii, paddling out to the lineup. Guy paddling next to me: \xe2\x80\x9canyone tell you that you look like Tony Hawk\xe2\x80\x9d
Me (thinking he knows the meme): \xe2\x80\x9cyes, but you\xe2\x80\x99re the first today\xe2\x80\x9d
Him: \xe2\x80\x9cyou should tell people you are and then sign his name, haha\xe2\x80\x9d
His friend: \xe2\x80\x9che\xe2\x80\x99s real one\xe2\x80\x9d'
b"RT @UPROXX: We talked with @TonyHawk about the revival of 'Pro Skater 1+2,' his delightful Twitter account, and skating being more diverse\xe2\x80\xa6"

b'Big thanks to @crashbandicoot for helping us out with this one! Excited to announce that #THPS 1+2 is coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X on March 26th, and on Nintendo Switch later this year \xf0\x9f\x9b\xb9\xf0\x9f\x8e\x89 https://t.co/er57IFzmfO'
b'If this works I owe @CrashBandicoot a customized skateboard\xe2\x80\xa6 maybe on old-school shape for those big feet.'
b'Just heard #Crash4 is coming to new platforms and I\xe2\x80\x99m kinda jealous. Hey @CrashBandicoot can you hook @TonyHawkTheGame up?'

b'After a long session of having Chris Gregson chase me around a skatepark with his camera while keeping me in frame the whole time, I figured it would be proper etiquette to return the favor. The last few tricks caught me by surprise (which is evident in my spontaneous commentary) https://t.co/xpf9u0gR3n'

Some still available for purchase; half of proceeds go to The @Skatepark Project: https://t.co/qnEbJC8jAQ https://t.co/eY8Ur1W8DI'

b'Here\xe2\x80\x99s a chance to win my skateboard used in my last post (720 battle): donate any amount to @thenineclub superchat and it will go to The @skatepark Project. Three random winners will get signed decks and one will get my used complete. \nStarts at 7pm PT: https://t.co/PAwOZBoFFQ'
b'...and automatically entered for a chance to win this skateboard. Good luck, and thanks for all of your support in my ongoing endeavors.'

b'I can\xe2\x80\x99t say for certain that this is the last one I\xe2\x80\x99ll ever do, but I can\xe2\x80\x99t imagine doing many more. So I\xe2\x80\x99m offering this board to raise money for public skateparks: donate any amount to @thenineclub superchat 1/27 7pm PT (on YouTube), & you\xe2\x80\x99ll actually be donating to @skatepark'

b'I recently made a 720 and it was a battle. The last one I made before this was over three years ago, and it\xe2\x80\x99s much harder now all things considered: recently dislocated fingers hinder my grab, my spin is slower so I need to go higher for full rotation and... \nI\xe2\x80\x99m really old. https://t.co/u8pbwRhS9j'
b'@karensung_yc @TonyHawkTheGame DM your address and I\xe2\x80\x99ll replace it'
b'A long time ago in a society far far away: double McTwists with @aaronjawshomoki at a @gumball3000 stop in Warsaw Poland, 2013, no cap (see what I did there) https://t.co/Ep9YPYm0NP'
b'@imretroactive Varvatos'
b'@JustinMcElroy Not at all! My advice is to hit the skateparks early when the younger (beginners) are there; they\xe2\x80\x99ll just think you\xe2\x80\x99re a cool dad'

b'Recently found a VHS tape from when my dad brought his videocamera to our first day of shooting Search For Animal Chin in 1987. The tape was labeled \xe2\x80\x9cBones Brigade at Dream Ramp\xe2\x80\x9d and sat forgotten for decades. Here is 1 minute of footage, including tricks that didn\xe2\x80\x99t make the cut https://t.co/oHPxL338zv'
b'To clarify: each person was joking, but unaware that they were redundant.'

b'Three different people boarding this plane - in three different ways - have told me that I look like Tony Hawk as they walked by my seat. My wife turned to me after the last one and said \xe2\x80\x9cyou started it\xe2\x80\x9d'
b'I\xe2\x80\x99d like buy a vowel... and a new hip. Watch #CelebrityWheelOfFortune this Thursday (1/7), 8|7c on ABC as I play for @FeedingSanDiego https://t.co/5cdE3AjuEA'

b'I [virtually] stopped by @thenineclub recently to talk about the MilkTwist, signing 12,000 pictures and contact highs from @B_Real & crew (among other not-so-salacious topics): https://t.co/Z6GQAwVYCu'

b'This is dedicated to Regis, who helped start @skatepark (formerly known as THF) in 2001 by inviting me on WWTBAM. I was new to the "celebrity" circuit & TV appearances, and very intimidated by the other sports legends (Barkley, Martina, Gordon, Elway, etc) https://t.co/h55zQQ4sGY'

#OlympianExperiences'

b'1) early 1977: trying to fit in by playing Little League and mostly striking out.\n2) late 1977: first time ever on a skateboard. I wasn\xe2\x80\x99t a \xe2\x80\x9cnatural\xe2\x80\x9d but I enjoyed the rush it provided & the freedom to practice on my own terms. I quit baseball the next season & never looked back. https://t.co/UpDscpXz5n'

b'Driving through Badlands with my family, no other cars in sight. Saw a downhill section and stopped so I can skate it. Halfway down two cars pass, one is a park ranger who turns around\nMe (to myself): busted\nPark ranger stops & rolls down window: \xe2\x80\x9care you TH? Can I get a selfie?\xe2\x80\x9d https://t.co/e3VxFXHZnW'
b'#fingerman https://t.co/DvAcb7Tw8e'
b'@decadent_hag @jonessodaco He did! It was a selfie while giving the finger to his own camera. Very \xe2\x80\x9con brand\xe2\x80\x9d'

b'Driving the @jonessodaco RV. A car passes, slows down then pulls up next to us. Guy in back gives me \xf0\x9f\x96\x95\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbcthen they follow us for AN HOUR. We make a stop and they park alongside.
Finger dude: can I get a picture?
me: is\xf0\x9f\x96\x95\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbchow you greet people?
him: you know how it is, bro
me: I don\xe2\x80\x99t'

b'Opening the door to our RV (family road trip), returning from local skatepark.
guy in passing car: \xe2\x80\x9cDo a kickflip!\xe2\x80\x9d
me: set board down, do kickflip
him: \xe2\x80\x9cI was just kidding. I saw you on that Koston / Berrics thing so that\xe2\x80\x99s why I said it.\xe2\x80\x9d
me: \xe2\x80\x9ckickflips are no laughing matter\xe2\x80\x9d'

me: oh, I get it. Let me warm up first'

b'Guy in crowded elevator (not the one I got stuck in): \xe2\x80\x9cHave we worked together?\xe2\x80\x9d

Me: yes, I am one
Him: \xe2\x80\x9cWe are honored to be in your presence\xe2\x80\x9d

[awkward glances until doors open]'

b'Guy approaches me while standing in line at coffee shop in Canc\xc3\xban.

Me: yes
Him (typing into phone): you are Tony Stark?'

b"At my gate, waiting for a flight:
Guy with 8x10's & pen approaches, asks me to sign them
Me: How did you get past security?
Him: I bought a $150 ticket 
Me: That you won't use?
Him: right
Me: so by selling these, you'll make at least that?
Him: I hope so or my wife will be pissed"
